rules_text: The owner of target artifact, battle, or enchantment shuffles it into their library and gains life equal to its mana value.
flavor_text:
[i]“It's told that before the mage-ring network, Vryn was a world on the brink of collapse. The few who ventured beyond the wasteland learned a different story.”
—Kavalester, Mage Hermit[/i]
